message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. How about $110?  I'm really interested in this product and I think we can make this work.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $120? It's a fair price considering its value.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  $120 is still a bit high for me.  How about we split the difference at $115?  It's a fair price for both of us.
